Thanks for playing Kawa & Khaje, in this version:

Please leave a review on the store and contact us to enhance/improve the game even more.
Happy Playing!

Thanks for playing Kawa & Khaje, based on your feedback, we published this update:
- Cloud Saving: Create an account in the settings to save. your progress in the cloud
- New Environments & Levels (Zakhu & Sulaymaniyah)
- Control in-game volume
- Various Bug Fixing

Don't forget to share about the game and write your review/rating in the store.

Also, it includes the features from the previous version:

Don't forget to share about the game and write your review/rating in the store.
